title: Historia de donne famose. Or The Romaine iubile which happened in the yeare 855. Disputed lately, that there vvas a woman pope named Ione the eight, against all the Iesuites, by a Germaine, but especially against Rob. Bellarmine father of all controuersies, his treatise De Romano pontifico. lib. 3. cap. 24. Newly translated into English
author: German.
publisher: [By Edward Allde] for Edward VVhite, and are to be solde at his shop, neere the little north doore of S. Paules, at the signe of the Gun,
